author: handelaar2
content: <@!203220829473996800> Also no epoch/slot/time counter on https://pyrmont.eth2.wtf Or am I missing something?.......Related question: Why not use https://eth2stats.io for 'eth2stats' like with the other testnets of the past?

author: protolambda
content: Timer should work, maybe reload the page? It's a different domain because it's not maintained by the same people anymore. Eth2stats.io was used by Alethio, the original creators, but they stopped and split up in different consensys projects. Now I'm just hosting it for Pyrmont

author: handelaar2
content: <@!203220829473996800> ok, timer works for me in Firefox but not Safari (eth2stats.io does work in Safari). Strange.  ...................... <@!386151184869752834> do you know what are the future plans of the eth2stats.io domain? Will it host a "mainnet tab"?
